item.title: Docker容器搭建ELK AIO
item.author: 五彩斑斓的黑
item.description: 镜像地址 https://hub.docker.com/r/sebp/elk 参数说明 docker run -itd -p 5601:5601 -p 9200:9200 -p 5044:5044 --name=elk -e TZ="Asia/Shanghai" sebp/elk TZ: 时区 (这里查看 可用时区参数), 例如 Asia/Shanghai、America/Los_Angeles (default is Etc/UTC, i.e. UTC). ES_HEAP_SIZE: Elasticsearch heap size，内存占用？ (default is 256MB min, 1G max) Specifying a heap size – e.g. 2g – will set both the min and max to the provided value. To set the min and max values separately, see the ES_JAVA_OPTS below. ES_JAVA_OPTS: additional Java options for Elasticsearch (default: "")
